title: Christine McGuinness puts on a daring display in a sheer blue gown at Manchester Fashion Festival
text:
She's no stranger to flaunting her amazing figure.

And Christine McGuinnes opted for another daring ensemble as she arrived for the Manchester Fashion Festival at the city's Hilton Hotel on Saturday.

The mother-of-three, 31, displayed her amazing figure in the sheer navy blue dress with only some delicately placed embroidery to preserve her modesty as she arrived for the fashion event.

Wow! Christine McGuinness, 31, cut a daring figure in a sheer blue gown covered with embroidery as she arrived for the Manchester Fashion Festival on Saturday

Christine ensured that every inch of her bronzed physique could be seen in the see-through gown covered in sparkling embroidery.

The dress boasted a dramatic skirt with a dark velvet trim, with her long blonde tresses styled into loose curls that tumbled down her back.

Christine made a glamorous arrival in the see-through blue gown as she made her way into the fashion event, with only her beaming smile to complete the outfit.

Fun: Among the other stars in attendance for the fashion event was glamour model Rhian Sugden, who highlighted her own jaw-dropping physique in a black velvet jumpsuit

Glamorous: The star added some dramatic flair to her outfit in the form of a gold geometric train as she arrived for the occasion

Among the other stars in attendance for the fashion event was glamour model Rhian Sugden, 33, who highlighted her own jaw-dropping physique in a black velvet jumpsuit.

The star - who is married to former Coronation Street star Oliver Mellor - added some dramatic flair to her outfit in the form of a gold geometric train as she arrived for the occasion.

Rhian completed her outfit with matching black pointed-toe heels and a simple box clutch bag as she strutted her way into the fashion event.

Looking good: Coronation Street star Kym Marsh, 43, also cut a chic figure in a black and pink leopard print mini dress

Coronation Street star Kym Marsh, 43, also cut a chic figure as she enjoyed an outing with her daughter Emilie, 22, at the event.

Kym highlighted her own amazing figure in a pink and black leopard print mini dress and matching strapped heels as she arrived for the occasion.

Emilie - who gave birth to her first child in May - put on a glamorous display in a sheer black dress with a quirky mesh front as she joined her mother for the evening.
description: The mother-of-three, 31, displayed her amazing figure in the sheer navy blue dress as she arrived for the fashion event at the city's Hilton Hotel on Saturday.
